0.Rule: We expect you to follow our Terms Of Service. Button above will lead you to it.

1.Rule: Don't use our application in any way that may violate YouTube, Google or Deezer Terms of Service.

2.Rule: Don't use 3rd party applications to send API requests, this might end your quota and block future requests.

3.Rule: Use of racist or generally offensive language in playlist names is forbidden.

4.Rule: Explicit, illegal or offensive image use on playlists is forbidden.

5.Rule: Misuse of our contact form may result in termination of your account.
